alert.note: Alert for Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 26 at 7:54AM PST until December 27 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional accumulations of two to four feet with isolated amounts up to five feet. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Sierra Nevada from Yosemite NP to Lake Isabella. * WHEN...Through 10 PM PST Monday. There will be a break in snowfall this afternoon, before snow begins once again tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Strong winds and heavy snow could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley
